alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 1:09PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Shelby County through 200 PM CDT... At 108 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Shelby County Airport, or near Alabaster, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alabaster, Pelham, Calera, Chelsea, Montevallo, Columbiana, Wilsonville, Vincent, Harpersville, Westover, American Village, Maylene, Shelby County Airport, Ballantrae, Camp Branch, Saddle Lake Farms, Siluria, Alabaster Veterans Park, Bounds Lake and Saginaw. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
